settings.question: HOW DO I APPLY THE 8TH LAYER?
settings.text: Applying the 8TH LAYER is super simple. Scroll down to view our application instructions video.

settings.question: WHAT SHOULD I DO BEFORE I APPLY THE 8TH LAYER?
settings.text: Please ensure that your skin is super hydrated by applying a simple clean moisturizer generously beforehand and waiting a few minutes to allow the moisturizer to penetrate before applying the 8th LAYER.  If your skin is dry, the 8th LAYER will not adhere properly and appear more visible.

settings.question: WHAT DO I DO AFTER I APPLY THE 8TH LAYER?
settings.text: Take the APPLICATION TOWELETTE and pat the entire 8TH LAYER (including the edges) a few more times to ensure that it is super hydrated.  Applying a simple clean moisturizer over the entire 8TH LAYER is also highly recommended to enhance invisibility.

settings.question: WHEN CAN I APPLY MAKEUP ON TOP OF THE 8TH LAYER?
settings.text: Please wait several minutes after application of the 8TH LAYER before applying makeup to allow the 8th LAYER to completely settle on to your skin.

settings.question: WHAT IF I GET A BUBBLE UNDER THE 8TH LAYER?
settings.text: A bubble can be prevented by ensuring that there is even continuous pressure applied to the 8TH LAYER with the overlying APPLICATION TOWELETTE.  The reason a bubble can pop up is if the 8TH LAYER did not get wet enough with the APPLICATION TOWELETTE.  When it is not wet enough, the 8TH LAYER will not adhere correctly.  If you see a bubble, do not worry.  Immediately take the APPLICATION TOWELETTE and remoisten the bubble area by patting it multiple times.  Then, slowly and gently push the bubble out to the nearest edge using the paper patch that the 8TH LAYER was previously attached to.

settings.question: WHAT IF THE EDGES OF THE 8TH LAYER ARE STILL VISIBLE?
settings.text: Visible edges mean that the edges did not get wet enough.  Immediately take the APPLICATION TOWELETTE and pat the visible edges to infuse more moisture into the 8TH LAYER.  If your APPLICATION TOWELETTE has become dry, then wet it with water and continue to pat the edges of the 8TH LAYER to ensure complete hydration.  Another option is to apply a clean moisturizer on top of the 8TH LAYER and all of the edges to further enhance hydration.  Doing both of these steps are recommended to enhance invisibility.

settings.question: WHEN I GLIDE OFF THE PAPER PATCH, PARTS OF THE 8TH LAYER PULL OFF WITH IT?
settings.text: This can happen if you (1) applied too much accidental downward pressure with the APPLICATION TOWELETTE (meaning you are accidently pushing directionally down towards your chin instead of pushing the APPLICATION TOWELETTE into your cheekbones; and please remember to use GENTLE pressure) or (2) too much downward pressure with the paper patch when gliding it off (be more gentle here as well) or (3) the 8TH LAYER got too wet from waiting too long with the APPLICATION TOWELETTE on top of it (decrease the time).

settings.question: IT’S BEEN A LONG DAY AND I AM READY TO REMOVE THE 8TH LAYER BUT I CANNOT SEE IT?  WHAT DO I DO?
settings.text: Try to use your fingertips to find the borders of the 8TH LAYER and gently roll the edges up.  Another easy way is to simply wash your skin with water (gentle soap may help even more) - as you rub back and forth with water, you will see an edge of the 8TH LAYER emerge.

settings.question: WHO SHOULD NOT APPLY THE 8TH LAYER?
settings.text: The 8TH LAYER is meant to be applied on healthy normal skin.  Please do not apply the 8TH LAYER if your skin is injured, inflamed, peeling, flaking, very dry, sensitive, or compromised in any way.  Do not apply if you have severe sensitivity or irritation to adhesives or bandages.  And do not apply if you are undergoing any procedures or interventions unless directed by your physician.

settings.question: WHAT IF I LOSE THE APPLICATION TOWELETTE?
settings.text: You can use any generously wet towel or cloth.  Unfortunately, you will not have the added skin benefits that the Application Towelette brings in helping with the secure and invisible adherence of the 8TH LAYER, however, the 8TH LAYER will still work.

settings.text: Please email info@8thlayerskin.com and we will be happy to assist you.

settings.text: Please email info@8thlayerskin.com and we will be most happy to assist you.
